title: Video on Exercise Toying with FavoriteToys

quizDescription.text:
Open Exercise 2 and complete all the TODOs. We really do want to do this in order:

1. Add am ID to the TextView in the layout
2. Find the ID for the textview in the MainActivity.java source
3. Append the content of out TuyNames string array to the TextView, followed by three line separators.

questionText.text: Please Submit the git link here
